ygData.subject: Re: pricing
ygData.msgSnippet: well, i must be doing something wrong, because i never have more than 100pp at a time... can anyone give me strategies and/or areas to sell at good prices? i
ygData.messageBody:
well, i must be doing something wrong, because i never have more than 100pp
at a time... can anyone give me strategies and/or areas to sell at good
prices? i kinda hate being strapped for cash...

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 22nd lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 10:05 AM 6/15/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Hapke, Matthew" <mahapke@...>
>
>I agree, though not quite as high. I have 1065 platinum in the bank
>right now, and had about 20plat last week at this time. I sell the int
>and wis rings at 10p, STR rings at 12p, and so on.
>Also, GREAT way to make money? go to South Karanas and start auctioning
>to buy Black pearls. Monks and rogues eat up that blackeded pearl ring!
>Another aweseom way to make money once some electrum start to become
>trivial is to look for 25 - 50 lvl clerics, Shamen, Druids, Paladins,
>and shoot em a quick tell about your ruby mask, and to only respond if
>interested. I been selling these masks at least one or two a night for
>300pp or more. People at high levels treat money ALOT differently then
>people at lower levels, and they will toss 300plat without thinking into
>a ruby mask. Not any skill increase, but I am saving up a big nest egg
>so I can go broke again with Gold at 24 =)
>
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Daniel Devorkin [SMTP:devo@...]
>> Sent: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 10:08 AM
>> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
>> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] pricing
>>
>> From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>>
>> man, you guys are charging way to little for the rings of +2!!!
>> they cost us about 6pp to make one ring, and your going and selling
>> for 6pp
>> or 7pp!
>> i sell mine for 12pp for 1 and 20pp for a set of 2!!
>> and they sell.
>> if i sell at your prices, and fail once, i am loosing money. do not
>> bring
>> the market down, bring it up!
>>
>>
>>
>> ----------------------------------------------------------------------
